channel.title: Disconnecting silab from client
channel.description:
i want it to were if ppl are using silabs they cannot connect to my server
i want them to be able to use my client only

item.title: Disconnecting silab from client
item.dc:creator: @weeds weeds
item.description:
@weeds wrote:

i suppose you could change your port so that they dunno what it is and hide it on your cleint so they don’t find lol only take this option if your like me and not very good at java coding

item.title: Disconnecting silab from client
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Make your client return a different number then Silab or Mopars client, then have your server check for that number.

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnecting silab from client
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

miss silabsoft

you could implement the cache checksum check, my clients checksum differs from the default cache checksum, However if you have hardcoded your clients fluff you will most likely have the same checksum as the default cache.

Do you know how i would do that

Read full topic
